code:
// Coqui TTS service for offline, unlimited text-to-speech
// This service provides custom voices for each god without API keys or limits
class CoquiTTSService{constructor(){this.isSupported=false;this.voices=[];this.audioContext=null;this.currentAudio=null;this.initializeVoices();this.checkSupport();}initializeVoices(){// Pre-defined voices for each god personality
this.voices=[// Elion - God of Wisdom (Orderly)
{id:'elion-voice',name:'Elion the Wise',language:'en',gender:'male',description:'Deep, authoritative voice with measured cadence',sampleRate:22050},// Nyxa - Goddess of Dreams (Mystical)
{id:'nyxa-voice',name:'Nyxa the Mysterious',language:'en',gender:'female',description:'Ethereal, whispery voice with mystical undertones',sampleRate:22050},// Zara - Goddess of Light (Radiant)
{id:'zara-voice',name:'Zara the Radiant',language:'en',gender:'female',description:'Warm, bright voice with uplifting energy',sampleRate:22050},// Malakai - God of Corruption (Corrupt)
{id:'malakai-voice',name:'Malakai the Corrupt',language:'en',gender:'male',description:'Dark, seductive voice with dangerous allure',sampleRate:22050},// Glitch - Digital Entity (Glitched)
{id:'glitch-voice',name:'Glitch the Digital',language:'en',gender:'neutral',description:'Digital, glitchy voice with electronic effects',sampleRate:22050}];}checkSupport(){// Check if Web Audio API is supported
this.isSupported=!!(window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext);console.log('🔍 Coqui TTS: Web Audio API check:',{hasAudioContext:!!window.AudioContext,hasWebkitAudioContext:!!window.webkitAudioContext,isSupported:this.isSupported});if(this.isSupported){try{this.audioContext=new(window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext)();console.log('🎵 Coqui TTS: Web Audio API initialized successfully');console.log('🎵 Audio Context state:',this.audioContext.state);}catch(error){console.error('❌ Coqui TTS: Failed to create AudioContext:',error);this.isSupported=false;}}else{console.warn('⚠️ Coqui TTS: Web Audio API not supported, falling back to Web Speech API');}}// Get available voices
getVoices(){return[...this.voices];}// Get voice by ID
getVoice(voiceId){return this.voices.find(voice=>voice.id===voiceId);}// Get voice by god temperament
getVoiceByTemperament(temperament){const voiceMap={'Orderly':'elion-voice','Mystical':'nyxa-voice','Radiant':'zara-voice','Corrupt':'malakai-voice','Glitched':'glitch-voice'};const voiceId=voiceMap[temperament]||'elion-voice';return this.getVoice(voiceId)||this.voices[0];}// Check if service is supported
isServiceSupported(){return this.isSupported;}// Generate speech using Coqui TTS (simulated for now)
async speak(text,options){console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Coqui TTS: speak() called with:",{text:text.substring(0,50),options});console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Coqui TTS: isSupported = ".concat(this.isSupported,", audioContext = ").concat(!!this.audioContext));if(!this.isSupported){throw new Error('Coqui TTS not supported in this browser');}if(!this.audioContext){throw new Error('AudioContext not initialized');}try{console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Coqui TTS: Speaking \"".concat(text.substring(0,50),"...\" with voice ").concat(options.voice));console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio Context state: ".concat(this.audioContext.state));// For now, we'll simulate the TTS with a delay and audio generation
// In a real implementation, this would call the Coqui TTS API or local model
// Simulate processing time
console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Simulating processing time...");await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,1000));// Generate a simple audio tone as placeholder
console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Generating placeholder audio...");await this.generatePlaceholderAudio(text,options);console.log('✅ Coqui TTS: Speech completed');}catch(error){console.error('❌ Coqui TTS Error:',error);throw error;}}// Generate placeholder audio (this would be replaced with real Coqui TTS)
async generatePlaceholderAudio(text,options){console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 generatePlaceholderAudio called with:",{text:text.substring(0,50),options});if(!this.audioContext){console.error('❌ No AudioContext available');return;}try{// Create a simple audio tone based on the voice characteristics
const voice=this.getVoice(options.voice);console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Voice found:",voice);if(!voice){console.error('❌ No voice found for options:',options);return;}// Generate different tones for different voices
const frequency=this.getVoiceFrequency(voice);const duration=Math.min(text.length*0.1,3);// Max 3 seconds
console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio params: frequency=".concat(frequency,"Hz, duration=").concat(duration,"s"));// Create oscillator for tone
const oscillator=this.audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=this.audioContext.createGain();console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio nodes created: oscillator=".concat(!!oscillator,", gainNode=").concat(!!gainNode));oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(this.audioContext.destination);console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio nodes connected");// Set voice characteristics
oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(frequency,this.audioContext.currentTime);oscillator.type='sine';console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Oscillator configured: frequency=".concat(frequency,"Hz, type=sine"));// Apply voice-specific effects
this.applyVoiceEffects(oscillator,gainNode,voice,options);console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Voice effects applied");// Play the audio
console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Starting audio playback...");oscillator.start(this.audioContext.currentTime);oscillator.stop(this.audioContext.currentTime+duration);console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio scheduled: start=".concat(this.audioContext.currentTime,"s, stop=").concat(this.audioContext.currentTime+duration,"s"));// Store reference for stopping
this.currentAudio=oscillator;console.log("\uD83C\uDFB5 Audio reference stored");}catch(error){console.error('Error generating placeholder audio:',error);}}// Get frequency based on voice characteristics
getVoiceFrequency(voice){const baseFrequencies={'elion-voice':120,// Deep, authoritative
'nyxa-voice':220,// Ethereal, mysterious
'zara-voice':180,// Warm, bright
'malakai-voice':140,// Dark, seductive
'glitch-voice':100// Digital, glitchy
};return baseFrequencies[voice.id]||150;}// Apply voice-specific audio effects
applyVoiceEffects(oscillator,gainNode,voice,options){const now=this.audioContext.currentTime;// Apply different effects based on voice
switch(voice.id){case'elion-voice':// Orderly: steady, measured
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.3,now);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0.3,now+0.1);break;case'nyxa-voice':// Mystical: ethereal, whispery
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.2,now);gainNode.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.1,now+0.5);break;case'zara-voice':// Radiant: warm, bright
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.4,now);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0.4,now+0.2);break;case'malakai-voice':// Corrupt: dark, seductive
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.25,now);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0.35,now+0.3);break;case'glitch-voice':// Glitched: digital, chaotic
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.3,now);// Add some glitch effects
const glitchInterval=setInterval(()=>{if(this.audioContext&&oscillator.frequency){oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(oscillator.frequency.value+(Math.random()-0.5)*50,this.audioContext.currentTime);}},100);// Clean up interval when oscillator stops
oscillator.onended=()=>{clearInterval(glitchInterval);};break;}}// Stop current speech
stop(){if(this.currentAudio){try{this.currentAudio.stop();}catch(error){// Oscillator might already be stopped
console.log('Oscillator already stopped');}this.currentAudio=null;}if(this.audioContext&&this.audioContext.state==='running'){this.audioContext.suspend();}}// Pause speech
pause(){if(this.audioContext&&this.audioContext.state==='running'){this.audioContext.suspend();}}// Resume speech
resume(){if(this.audioContext&&this.audioContext.state==='suspended'){this.audioContext.resume();}}// Get service status
getStatus(){return{supported:this.isSupported,voices:this.voices.length,ready:this.isSupported&&!!this.audioContext};}// Test method to verify audio is working
async testAudio(){console.log('🧪 Coqui TTS: Testing audio...');console.log('🧪 Service status:',this.getStatus());if(!this.isSupported){console.error('🧪 Test failed: Service not supported');return;}try{// Test with a simple beep
const oscillator=this.audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=this.audioContext.createGain();oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(this.audioContext.destination);oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(440,this.audioContext.currentTime);// A4 note
oscillator.type='sine';gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0.1,this.audioContext.currentTime);oscillator.start(this.audioContext.currentTime);oscillator.stop(this.audioContext.currentTime+0.5);console.log('🧪 Test audio played successfully!');}catch(error){console.error('🧪 Test failed:',error);}}// Cleanup resources
destroy(){this.stop();if(this.audioContext){this.audioContext.close();this.audioContext=null;}}}export default new CoquiTTSService();
